biography.bio: At the age of three, André Zacharie Raimbourg and his family moved to a town in the region of Normandy called Bourville. He finished school at the age of 15 and began to work as a baker. He was already playing harmonica, mandoline and cornet when he engaged himself in a village band. In the beginning of 1940 while in the army making music-hall show for the troops, he changed his name into Andrel like his idol Fernandel from whom he was singing the songs. He began to write his own songs, making a name by himself, and so in 1942 took a new name, further from "Fernandel": Bourvil(le). He was recognized as a stand-up comic, dressed as a farmer grown too fast for the shirt he wears, hair coming down on his forehead, a simple minded but crafty naive. At the end of the war the radio extended his fame. His first parts on the screen were based only on this character. It's only in 1956 with Four Bags Full (1956) of Claude Autant-Lara that he really began to give his real potential as an actor on the screen. His greatest popular successes will come under the direction of Gérard Oury.
biography.name: Bourvil

biography.bio: Annie Cordy was born on June 16, 1928 in Schaerbeek, Brussels, Belgium as Léonie Cooreman. She is an actress, known for Numéro 1 (1975), Le chat (1971) and Bourvil, un éclat de rire (1982).
biography.name: Annie Cordy

biography.bio: Jacqueline Noëlle was born on December 25, 1926 in Paris, Ile-de-France, France as Jacqueline Noëlle Larose. She is an actress, known for La chèvre (1981), Elle s'appelait Sarah (2010) and Poisson d'avril (1954).
biography.name: Jacqueline Noëlle

biography.bio: Maurice Biraud was born on March 3, 1922 in Paris, France. He was an actor, known for The Last Train (1973), Taxi for Tobruk (1961) and Le septième juré (1962). He was married to Françoise Soulié. He died on December 24, 1982 in Paris.
biography.name: Maurice Biraud

biography.bio: Louis Bugette was born on May 29, 1904. He was an actor, known for Tout va bien (1972), Greed in the Sun (1964) and Le machin (1973). He died on March 18, 1975.
biography.name: Louis Bugette

biography.placeOfBirth: Belfort, Territoire de Belfort, Franche-Comté, France
biography.bio: Paul Faivre was born on March 3, 1886 in Belfort, Territoire de Belfort, Franche-Comté, France as Henri Paul Faivre. He was an actor, known for ...And God Created Woman (1956), The Long Absence (1961) and Ni vu, ni connu (1958). He died on March 5, 1973 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Paul Faivre

biography.bio: Suzanne Grey was born on June 28, 1917. She was an actress, known for Love Is My Profession (1958), Casque d'Or (1952) and Zone frontière (1950). She died on December 13, 2005 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Suzanne Grey

biography.bio: René Havard was born on December 20, 1923 in Paris, France. He was an actor and writer, known for Bob le Flambeur (1956), The Cow and I (1959) and Gigot (1962). He died on December 7, 1987 in Paris.
biography.name: René Havard

biography.bio: Jean Hébey was born on August 29, 1916 in Algiers, Alger, France. He was an actor and producer, known for Queen's Necklace (1946), Flesh and the Woman (1954) and Sur un arbre perché (1971). He died on October 31, 1992 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Jean Hébey

actors.character: M. Dutreille, le client du garage

biography.bio: Charles Lemontier was born on April 21, 1894 in Toul, Meurthe-et-Moselle, Lorraine, France as Louis Jean Eugène Lemontier. He was an actor and writer, known for Utopia (1951), À la manière de Sherlock Holmes (1956) and L'école des journalistes (1936). He died on May 28, 1965 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Charles Lemontier

biography.bio: Guy Loriquet was born on August 10, 1922 in Laval, Mayenne, France. He is an actor and director, known for Sur l'Arroyo (1956), La rue chinoise (1956) and Poisson d'avril (1954).
biography.name: Guy Loriquet

biography.bio: Gérard Sabatier is an actor, known for Poisson d'avril (1954), Le regret de Pierre Guilhem (1968) and Passion de femmes (1955).
biography.name: Gérard Sabatier

biography.bio: Zeimet is an actor, known for Poisson d'avril (1954) and Le sang à la tête (1956).
biography.name: Zeimet

biography.bio: Denise Grey was born on September 17, 1896 in Chatillon, Valle d'Aosta, Italy as Jeanne Marie Laurentine Edouardine Verthuy. She was an actress, known for The Party (1980), Carve Her Name with Pride (1958) and Devil in the Flesh (1947). She died on January 13, 1996 in Paris, Ile-de-France, France.
biography.name: Denise Grey

biography.bio: Pierre Dux was born on October 21, 1908 in Paris, France as Pierre Alex Martin Vargas. He is known for his work on Z (1969), The Grand Maneuver (1955) and Aimez-vous Brahms? (1961). He was married to Francine Bessy. He died on December 1, 1990 in Paris 6, Paris.
biography.name: Pierre Dux
